form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, N-4 ( 4(5-2-82) Y

full_text: Screened by NARA 7/28/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OM3 NO. 1115-0009 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE Approval Expires 1/31/84 FEESTANIE APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION IMMIG.&HATZ 524.83 Mail or take to: SEP 14 8 25 AM '82 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE pu 8'40 LOS ANGELES biame DISTRICT OFFICE ALTEN REGISTRATION (See INSTRUCTIONS. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration receipt card and the number of your card, If you did not register, so state.) QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT. PLEASE PRINT OR Name CHAUDHRY ABDUL MAJID FATE No. A 34 698 683 316A Date: (Leave Blank) Sept 1982 2/2V83 (1) My full true and correct name is MAUDHRY ABDUL MAJID 11419 SPRUCE Full true name without abbreviations) (2) I now live at STREET (Number and street, ) LYNWOOD Los AN GELES- California 90262 (City county, state, zip code) NOW (3) I was born on 4- 15-1912 in GURAT CITY, PUNJAB INDIA (PAKISTAN) (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) ( County, province, or state) (Country) (4) I request that my name be changed to N/A SAme (5) Other names I have used are: N/A NONE (Include maiden name) Sex: Male Female (6) Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? Yes No (If "Yes", explain fully) (7) Can you read and write English? Yes No (8) Can you speak English? Yes No (9) Can you sign your name in English? Yes No (10) My lawful admission for permanent residence was on 2. 21 78 under the name of CHAUDHRY ABDUL MAJID (Month) Day) (Year) at NEW YORK NEWYORK (City) (State) (11) (a) I have resided continuously in the United States since 2 2 78 (Month) CALIFORNIA (Day) (Year) (b) I have resided continuously in the State of since 2 21 78 (Month) (Day) (Year) (c) During the last five years I have been physically in the United States for a total of 57 months. (12) Do you intend to reside permanently in the United States? Yes No If "No," explain: (13) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years?
